Mailing Address: c/o MADD Central Okanagan9-3151 Lakeshore Rd, #251Kelowna, BC     V1W 3S9
Service Details: - Offers support services to victims of impaired drivers by providing emotional support, referrals to service providers, and information to help deal with the criminal justice process- Heightens awareness about the dangers of alcohol and/or drug-impaired driving to save lives and prevent injuries on our roads
Meetings: Meetings held monthly; please call or email for details
